title: Cynosys External Cheat for Counter-Strike 2
text:
I recommend you to download a proven cheat Cynosys on CS2 from the developer BarsxST. Multifunctional cheat, which you can independently update under the next update of the game CS2, which simplifies the process and waiting for updates from the developer. There are settings such as: ESP, Wallhack, Aimbot, TriggerBot, RCS, AntiAim, AntiFlash, Bhop, Save configs, change the appearance of the menu and many other functions.
At the moment, the cheat has proven itself among other cheats for shooter CS2. Simple and fast startup, easy control and the ability to independently update offsets.
All functions work and are ready to use. If you want to play Legit and not get banned, then we advise you not to enable Bhop, TriggerBot and AntiFlash, these functions are recorded in the memory of the game and there is a chance to get a quick ban in the game.

[INSERT] or [FN+INS] - open menu
[END] - close menu
It's very simple, you just need to replace two files offsets.json and client.dll.json
Where do I find these files?
- Go to the CS 2 offsets dumper at the link https://github.com/a2x/cs2-dumper
Find these files and download them to your computer and then replace them.
How to open rar, zip, 7-Zip cheat?
How to open .DLL cheat?
creator: BarsxST
